effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has already moved this turn, its ability is nullified.

short_effect.sword_shield: Nullifies the target’s ability if it moves earlier.

short_effect.legends_arceus: Nullifies the target’s ability if it moves earlier.

flavor_text.sword_shield: If the Pokémon the user has inflicted damage on have already used their moves, this move eliminates the effect of the target’s Ability.
